thread.title: Save 15% with Advance Booking at Microtel
thread.title_full: Save 15% with Advance Booking at Microtel

title: Save 15% with Advance Booking at Microtel
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > Save 15% with Advance Booking at Microtel Save 15% with Advance Booking at Microtel by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - September 14, 2015 at 5:00 PM Tweet 
Planners can save with Microtel's advance booking discount—to the tune of 15 percent off the best available rate when you reserve at least seven days in advance. 
Prepayment is required at the time of booking, and you must book on the Microtel site. Discount is applied to Microtel's best-available-rate category. As with all Microtel stays, you'll receive daily continental breakfast, Internet access, and free local and long-distance calls within the continental U.S. 
Participating properties include: Microtel Inn & Suites Madison, Wisconsin Microtel Inn & Suites York, Maine Microtel Inn & Suites Salt Lake City Microtel Inn & Suites Albuquerque 
How to get this deal: To learn more or to book, visit Microtel's site . 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
